arpautils
  • Reference
  • News

Dato un vettore di interi, ne dà una rappresentazione sintetica in una stringa.

squeeze(x)

Arguments

x

Details

Value

References

Note

See also

Examples

 x <- c(2:5,8,13:21)
 x
#>  [1]  2  3  4  5  8 13 14 15 16 17 18 19 20 21
 paste(x,collapse=",")
#> [1] "2,3,4,5,8,13,14,15,16,17,18,19,20,21"
 squeeze(x)
#> [1] "2-5,8,13-21"
 squeeze(sample(x=1:1000,size=995))
#> [1] "1-53,55-336,338-608,610-650,652-756,758-1000"
